column2: Umulumendo na toloka mumulu pama pili uku bomfya akali planga aka papatala. Umbi naikala panshi pamulu uwa chulu
column3: Kule moneka kwaba impepo uku. Uwikele panshi ale tamba umunankwe utolweke mumulu
column4: Endita, pantu bonse babili nabai chingilisha ku mpepo. Naba fwala nefya mpepo
column5: Elyo kunshi kwa aka kantu aka papatala atolweke nako bali lembako ama lembo aya balala balala
column6: Limbi balembako ishina iya mwine nangula uwa pangile aka kantu
